function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg: '请按照公司涉军项目管理要求，履行线下审批程序!'
'在底稿系统中完成“项目承揽及立项阶段”底稿上传工作，才能发起立项流程!'

<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.papers.LinkstecBean");
var result  = bean.execute("1006",$Login.User.UserID,"2",O_WORKFLOW.XMMC,"lcIB_LXLCB"," ", " ");
var code =result.get('result');
code ==1;

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and SFWCXC = 3",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
cnt1 >0 &&  cnt2 > 0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and SFWCXC = 3",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
cnt1 > 0 &&  cnt2 ==0

step.name: 投资银行总部文管审核
投资银行总部职能审批
投资银行总部总经理审批

function.name: lb.WfFormUpdate
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var shls=O_WORKFLOW.LC;
if (shls == null || shls == 0){
shls = 1;
}else{
shls = shls+1;
}
shls;

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var ret=LB_sqlProcedure("{call JGCRM.PRO_JG_LCFZTH(:state{int},:msg,?,?,?,?)}",[$Login.User,$Login.IP,O_WORKFLOW.InstID,47]);
var r1=ret.get("state");
var r2=ret.get("msg");
ABS_IF(r1>0,1,r2)

step.name: 质控主副审审核(出具立项审核意见)

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var fhbz = ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var fhz=true;
if(fhbz==0){
  fhz=true;
}else{
  var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.TaskEndBean");
  var result = bean.perform($Login.User.UserID,O_WORKFLOW.InstID);
  var code = result.get('O_CODE');
  var note = result.get('O_NOTE');
  if(code > 0){
      ABS_SETRETNOTE(note);
     fhz= true;
   }else{
      ABS_SETRETNOTE(note);
      fhz= false;
   }
}
fhz;

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var ret=LB_sqlProcedure("{call JGCRM.PRO_JG_LCFZTH(:state{int},:msg,?,?,?,?)}",[$Login.User,$Login.IP,O_WORKFLOW.InstID,49]);
var r1=ret.get("state");
var r2=ret.get("msg");
ABS_IF(r1>0,1,r2)

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg: '线下表决请出示立项意见汇总!'

result.display-name: 线下出具立项会意见汇总

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var c1=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CEIL(COUNT(1)*1/2) FROM ECIF.lcIB_LXLCB_LXBJTP WHERE lcIB_LXLCB_ID = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
var c2=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1)+1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_LXLCB_LXBJTP WHERE lcIB_LXLCB_ID = ? AND BJYJ IS NOT NULL",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
var c3=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24')) >= TO_NUMBER(?||'12') ",[O_WORKFLOW.BJJZRQ])
c2>=c1&&c3==1

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var c1=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CEIL(COUNT(1)*1/2) FROM ECIF.lcIB_LXLCB_LXBJTP WHERE lcIB_LXLCB_ID = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
var c2=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1)+1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_LXLCB_LXBJTP WHERE lcIB_LXLCB_ID = ? AND BJYJ IS NOT NULL",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
var c3=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24')) >= TO_NUMBER(?||'12') ",[O_WORKFLOW.BJJZRQ])
c2<c1||c3==0

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 90 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_LXLCB",O_WORKFLOW.ID,91,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg: '请出具立项意见汇总/立项决议'

step.name: 会议组织者上传立项决议
质控部主审上传全套立项材料
会议组织者填写底稿编号及存放的物理位置
保荐业务部门负责人审核
资本市场部总经理审核意见
项目组答复资本市场部意见
保荐代表人审核资本市场意见回复
业务部门质控专员审核资本市场意见回复
业务部总经理审核确认资本市场意见回复

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from os_currentstep where entry_id=?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID])==0
